label: Título
trigo.title: Selecione a função trigonométrica
algebra.title: Selecione o tipo de álgebra
base.title: Selecione Base
angle.title: Selecione o tipo de ângulo
digit.title: Selecione os dígitos da saída
TutoExplainContent: Welcome into the Calculate activity. Calculate is a calculator. The interface provides the simplest functions directly, but it also supports more complicated math and variables and even basic plotting
TutoTrigoContent: Click here to select a trigonometric function, such as sin or cos. The value given to the function should be in brackets
TutoAlgebraContent: Click here to select an algebric function, such as power or square root. The value given to the function should be in brackets
TutoBaseContent: Click here to select base used for computation: decimal (10), binary (2), octal (8) and hexadecimal (16)
TutoAngleContent: Click here to select angle type from degrees (default) and radians
TutoOutputContent: Click here to change number digits after the decimal point: from 6 (default) to 15
TutoInputContent: Here you can see the calculator. You can either write numbers on your keyboard or tap the buttons
TutoResultContent: Here is the history of all of your operations
TutoLabelContent: Type here to give a label to your current compute that will be then shown in the result zone
TutoFunctionContent: To plot a graph, type its equation in the calculation field. For example: f(x)=2*x+3
